website_summaries.verdict: A delightful grill that performs well after some assembly.
pros: Offers 557 square inches total cooking space
Features cast iron cooking grids and chrome-plated warming racks
Removable ash tray offers easy cleanup
Those in charge of grilling report immediate comfort with the design and function of this grill

customer_reviews.title: Great price for a dual fuel grill!
customer_reviews.text: Definitely dual fuel. Charcoal one side, gas the other. Excellent when put together. Great price. The only reason for not having 5 stars is it took over six hours to assemble, following the directions, which I recomend, and I use tools for my job. Btw, GREAT PRICE for dual fuel!
customer_reviews.author: OkieBob

customer_reviews.title: Low price, low quality. There is a hole in the grill lid.
customer_reviews.text: We thought this was a great price for a dual fuel combo grill. But upon receiving the product we now know that the price is cheap because the quality is poor. Assembly went fine. Would be nice if the pieces were labeled with a letter or number. The main complaint is that in the propane side lid there is a small hole (pictured). Also, the top panel is bent, preventing either lid from resting flush both sides. My advice would be to pay an additional $50 and get a better product.
customer_reviews.author: Erike

customer_reviews.title: Awesome grill for the price!!
customer_reviews.text: This grill has everything you need! A charcoal side, and a gas side with a 3 burner grill, and a side burner. It took about 2.5 hours to put together following the 27 steps in the instruction booklet. With that said, it was actually pretty easy. It also comes with tools, a phillips screwdriver and wrenches. Cooked food using both sides at the same time, and the food came out delicious! As shown in the pictures, I also bought the 72 inch cover for it to protect it from the elements. I am very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love my new grill!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am only giving 4 stars right now because we haven't used the charcoal side yet. (UPDATE: Used the charcoal side and love it just as much as the gas side) I will update after we do. YOU MUST FOLLOW INSTRUCTIONS TO A T! Check your parts because there are so many. We were shorted 1 but they sent it right away. This is a heavy duty wonderful grill. There is a lot of assembly so expect up to 3 hours to assemble, but it is so worth it!
customer_reviews.author: JKeasler

customer_reviews.title: Nice pit
customer_reviews.text: Got it in 2 days ahead of scheduled delivery so cool there, took my son and I about 3.5 hours to assemble with short breaks. Use your own box wrenches as the ones it comes with are cheap and don’t work too well. The bottom pan the tank sits in was dented but other than that I was happy with the build. Seasoned it as soon as I got it together. Wasn’t too keen on the plastic wheels but I just hope they hold up.
customer_reviews.author: Wesleyc

customer_reviews.title: Read details!
customer_reviews.text: Nice grill once you put every single piece together. Took us about 4 hours to assemble. Pieces aren't labeled and the book's pictures are difficult to see/ decipher (no words). I didn't read the description for the assembly prior to ordering. Once together there was an issue with the igniter but customer service was quick to send a replacement piece. Over all love the product just need to revamp the instruction book and label pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Ansley

customer_reviews.title: Very nice once you build it.
customer_reviews.text: If you don't like building things, it may not be for you. Lots of pieces both large and small. It take a few hours to build, but well worth it once you get it completed. The instructions are fairly good, but you need to pay close attention. I missed one piece and had to do a small amount of disassembly to get it in its proper place. Other than that, it went reasonably smooth. 4 to 5 hours to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Bill H.

customer_reviews.title: time to build
customer_reviews.text: 1. give yourself time to build this. 2. I did get stumped on one item had to call the neighbor over to get a second opinion I was holding it at the wrong angle. but other than that one item it took me about and hour and half. havn't used the charcoal side yet. I had a grill like this years ago. I like to use gas when in a hurry and if having company I use the charcoal side.
customer_reviews.author: john e. novak jr

customer_reviews.title: I Like It
customer_reviews.text: I was kind of worried because of the reviews on assembly, but to me it was very simple according to the pictures. I liked the picture directions. Used a few times now both sides and for the price was pretty good. My only issue is the cooking size isn't good for a medium to large gathering mainly small family BBQ. That's the only reason for the 4 star instead of 5 at least in my appeal.
customer_reviews.author: Omar

customer_reviews.title: Perfect! I can cook with propane when it's dry ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! I can cook with propane when it's dry out and there's a fire hazard. I can cook with charcoal any other time.
customer_reviews.author: D. Wixon

customer_reviews.title: need to adjust gas burners
customer_reviews.text: Took me (fairly experienced handyman) a couple of hours to assemble. There was no damaged components as delivered. I had one threaded bushing without threads. Manufacturing defect. I wasn't going to completely dismantle the grill to send it back, I managed to add a longer screw and nut to replace the missing threads. I really like the size of both sides. It is quite large to store when not in use. It weighed closer to 100 pounds than 40 pounds when delivered.
customer_reviews.author: slats

customer_reviews.title: Grill vs Griddle.
customer_reviews.text: It was not what I had wanted. I want a grill and a griddle and got two grills. The pictures they provide do not show inside of the unit up close. I have used the one grill a few times so far but it is too hot over 100 degrees nightly to light it up lately. I want to find a griddle that will fit on the propane side so I can cook breakfast on the unit. That was the plan in the first place. Still need to go out and get the propane tank.
customer_reviews.author: WEM3

customer_reviews.title: Make sure that all the parts is included.
customer_reviews.text: The instruction was very confusing to follow, the holes did not match up,I had to drill more holes in the pieces to match the other side, the top and warming rack are are so flimsy the first time I used it, it fell and the food slid off, very time consuming to assemble, I have reinforce it before I use it again I like the fact that it is Duel Fuel that is the best feature, fortunately I had the tools to make the necessary revisions to the holes.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel H. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Large waste of time to build . No customer support
customer_reviews.text: The grill itself is decent but the 3 hours of putting it together because they have terrible instructions and no labeled parts make it a horrible experience. The bonus is a broken temperature gauge which Amazon and the company we bought it from will not replace. Not a great experience. And we have yet to use it completely since the gauge is broken.
customer_reviews.author: vw

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Alot of the holes on the lid did not align up
customer_reviews.author: tim w.

customer_reviews.title: No worth it.
customer_reviews.text: The grill looks beautiful..but that is where it ends. Parts were missing from the grill. There were parts that came bent. It was a gift to my father in law for Father's Day and his birthday. The instructions were unclear. He started putting it together on Tuesday and finished today (Saturday). Lucky he is a handyman and made it work. He said it is too much to take down and send back or he would.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A MILLION PIECES!
customer_reviews.text: This grill works great. But buyer beware that every piece comes in teeny tiny pieces. I mean every piece. It took my brother all day to put together and he is a professional contractor.
customer_reviews.author: M Larios

customer_reviews.title: Great Grill
customer_reviews.text: Was the best price. Replaced a older dual grill. I like the dual ash drawers and when its opened its one large flat grill across with no bar in the middle. Haven't had any problems, Used it to cook on in the hurricane. The extra burner was great to cook eggs on when the power was out.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: AWFUL! I WISH I COULD GET MY MONEY BACK!
customer_reviews.text: Omg please spare yourself and don't think this is a good buy!!! Awful awful awful to assemble. The instructions are abstract and you have to figure most of the assembly by yourself! What a headache! Please spend a couple of more dollars and get a better grill. I wish I did!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tanya

customer_reviews.title: Lid was bent. Tag upside down.
customer_reviews.text: It is one of the most time consuming assembles I have done. That could pass as ok given it is a dual grill. But when the parts are bent and the tags is upside down. Thats when you give it 3 stars. One of the lids (charcoal side) is bent and the tag is upside down. The lid rubs against the other lid and both lids look crooked.
customer_reviews.author: asad muslim

customer_reviews.title: Versatile,  great value, great quality to make for a happy environment
customer_reviews.text: Product is fantastic. Took a few hours to assemble, but if you follow instructions exactly it is straightforward if you are good with extended bending over. Quality of materials is great. Looks fantastic. Turned this old charcoal only guy into a gas lover. A lot of nice to haves: great rack, bottle opener, hooks for tools, temperature gauges. Great to fit multiple steaks and veggies. Side burner very handy. Has adjustable rack on charcoal side to control temperature. Easy to light off. Temperature control is great except in high winds on vent side, but go figure :) Hope to use it for years.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!  ALLOW TIME FOR ASSEMBLY!
customer_reviews.text: Just like all the other comments say, allow yourself time to assemble this BBQ. The instructions are pretty good...FOLLOW THEM to the T! The slide-out drip pans are a bit flimsy, but other than that, the unit is sturdy and very well built. Fired up the charcoal side immediately and so far so good! GREAT VALUE for the money!!
customer_reviews.author: Mo Sartor

customer_reviews.title: Just take it time.
customer_reviews.text: Just make time to put it together. It takes a couple hours to put together like 4 hours. The parts are very flimsy. Some of the parts were bent and I had to straighten them out so they would fit. After all of that the BBQ is really good. Put together it's really sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Christoher B

customer_reviews.title: Great value for your dollar!!!
customer_reviews.text: It’s a pain to put it together but fantastic once it is done! Still giving this product 5 stars, because it is a great value! Thank you for the fast shipping! We are grilling almost everyday!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Shipping was less than perfect
customer_reviews.text: We like the unit but it was received in a mangled box which forced us to bend and reshape the entire unit to get it together,
customer_reviews.author: David Cates

customer_reviews.title: Rust damage 1rst day of use.
customer_reviews.text: We took this grill out of our garage for the first time yesterday. Grilled some delicious steaks. After which, it began raining. The grill was too hot to cover with the cover we bought for it. Today, the top has a large rust spot about the size of a dinner plate on it. It took several hours to assemble. I am unable to get a photo to upload. The Amazon site keeps resetting when I attempt.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie

customer_reviews.title: MISSING ESSENTIAL PARTS
customer_reviews.text: Instructions were not very clear. While putting this together, I discovered that one of the lids does not have the necessary screw threads that are supposed to be welded in, like the other lid has. Speaking of the other lid, it came warped so that it will not sit straight when closed. This was a gift for Father's Day and it can't even be used until we contact the manufacturer. DON'T WASTE YOUR MONEY. Just go to Sears or something.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tin BOX
customer_reviews.text: Nothing really good to say about this thing. Parts are very thin tin. Poorly constructed parts that don’t line up when screwed together. I attached pics. Parts were bent and scratch. Paint is very thin also. Highly do not recommend buying this unit. Direction are as poor as quality . Parts are not number in directions and not very clear. For just your average person to put together, No way . If you can built rockets then this is for you😂 So in closing, if you buy this and do t read reviews the. You deserve to own it.
customer_reviews.author: Everett Trinidad

customer_reviews.title: Time to grill!
customer_reviews.text: It took some time to assemble but it was pretty easy( I used the directions). Once it was assembled I realized just how big it was.I love this grill! Both sides work just fine.We love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice but poor instructions
customer_reviews.text: The product came bent and dented. I was able to put it together only to realize it is not the product pictured. I have no writing on front panel for usage and the instructions are only poor visuals, which is why it’s a 3-4 hour setup. All the pieces need to be numbered.
customer_reviews.author: L. English

customer_reviews.title: Best of both worlds
customer_reviews.text: Product is great. Looks nice and good quality. Assembly wasnt easy and it did take about 3 hours but my husband said that the directions were well written and helpful. Love the combination and having the best of both worlds of gas and charcoal.
customer_reviews.author: Mary C

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality. Damaged parts on arrival. Poor instructions
customer_reviews.text: Very poor quality. Took four hours to assemble. And had to make improvements to get it to assembly correctly. Parts arrived damaged. Instructions were very poor for use and see
customer_reviews.author: dale mckinney

customer_reviews.title: Awesome BBQ
customer_reviews.text: We love it. Arrived in very good packaging. Installation took about 3 hours. Reviews mentioning issues with handles getting hot, probably did not install it properly. It is very convenient for family with nice features. The gas and charcoal can together help to serve large gatherings.
customer_reviews.author: Abdalla

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty grill
customer_reviews.text: Once you figure out how to assemble everything it is an amazing grill I leave it out in the rain and no rust or ware on it I was a little worried it wouldn’t be big enough but it definitely is I’m very happy with this product!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: GREAT VALUE
customer_reviews.text: One part was missing but it was just the holder for the utensils. GREAT Smoker Great Grill Husband loved it well worth the money. It is a lot to assemble but worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Assembly was not easy!
customer_reviews.text: The product was banged up and many parts were bent, which made it difficult to put together, but luckily we had tools and know how to fix the large dents and bends in the metal. It said it could be put together in one hour, but with the extra work and none of the parts being marked, just pictures, it took us like 3 hours. I bought this as a fathers day gift....very dissappointed in the way it arrived, since the box only had one place that was concerning.
customer_reviews.author: Ronda Seebold

customer_reviews.title: I’d second guess
customer_reviews.text: Had to rig grill. The bolt that holds base for the grills bottoms screw was falling straight out. Instructions are very poor! Mise well build blind handed
customer_reviews.author: Brittney L.

customer_reviews.title: Difficult build but great grill
customer_reviews.text: Once you get it put together, it’s a great grill. Love having the option of gas or charcoal. But beware, it takes HOURS to put it together!
customer_reviews.author: CMK

customer_reviews.title: Decent product, unreadable instructions
customer_reviews.text: Good product. Bad packaging- dented before delivery. Instructions ( from a professional engineer) were too small to read. 6 hour build
customer_reviews.author: C. Weaver

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: Not bad it's worth the price. Need patience to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: JOSEPH

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I had this now for a couple weeks. Cooked with many times. Great grill. Looks nice great detail. I really like the crank handle for charcoal tray. The others I saw had brackets on each side you had to pick up and move at same time. That would be dangerous when hot.
customer_reviews.author: steveo

customer_reviews.title: Happy but not happy!
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a father's day/b-day gift. It smokes n grills the meat great but first time using it the grill side of the lid started bubbling out, I emailed the company about this issue but never got a response! Happy but not happy!!!
customer_reviews.author: kelly

customer_reviews.title: Good bbq. Bad seller.
customer_reviews.text: Great BBQ. Fairly easy to assemble. Sold by knock off company that has no customer service for missing parts. Great dealer, but buyer beware if product comes damaged or with missing parts. You will have to buy them from the manufacture yourself.
customer_reviews.author: Jodimarieclare

customer_reviews.title: Complicated to assemble
customer_reviews.text: If we didn’t have our old grill just like this, would have been extremely difficult to put together. The shipper failed. Box beat up, grill lid dented in. We made it work with a rubber mallet. Needs better packaging
customer_reviews.author: Lfarrar

customer_reviews.title: Good product for the price, Assembly is a pain in the neck.
customer_reviews.text: Good product for the price, Assembly is a pain in the neck.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Looks great but very difficult to put together. Gas grill section is not well made.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn S.

customer_reviews.title: Assembly required!!
customer_reviews.text: Assembly took 5hrs... I opened the box and was very confused so I paid someone with Experience to put it together and it still took him 5hrs!!
customer_reviews.author: Cdoze

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: Horrendous product. Parts didnt fit and others were damaged. Cheaply made. I wouldnt even recomend this product to people I dislike. It's that bad.
customer_reviews.author: Sean O'Bannon

customer_reviews.title: Great grill
customer_reviews.text: Great grill. Took a little bit to put it together but is perfect for us.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Young

customer_reviews.title: Iffy Recommendation
customer_reviews.text: Product delivery was delayed by a week, difficult to assemble due to difficulty with directions & pictures and once assembled I realized that the top/lid of the grill was delivered bent.
customer_reviews.author: Patrice Harrell

customer_reviews.title: Like my product and fast delivery
customer_reviews.text: Like my product and fast delivery Very hard to put together, but we love to use it
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Burns

customer_reviews.title: Selling used as new
customer_reviews.text: Please don’t buy. I ordered one of these grills thinking it would be brand new. The grill was not brand new it had rust and scratch’s all over. This grill also took 5 hrs to put together. Please don’t buy they are selling used product as new.
customer_reviews.author: Gia Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Fathers day present. Tedious to built . Very rewarding afterwards. No complaint.
customer_reviews.author: JBUG

customer_reviews.title: Total junk!
customer_reviews.text: Sucks! First time Charcoal side used paint on top bubbles up and grill top right side warped! Junk - why I tried to return, but amazon wouldn’t cover shipping. (Cost more to ship back than I paid for it)
customer_reviews.author: Jeff C.

customer_reviews.title: Best bbq grill i use so far
customer_reviews.text: Best part of this grill is gas and charcoal in one grill.
customer_reviews.author: Nazrul B.

customer_reviews.title: I would never buy this product again nor would I recommend it to anyone
customer_reviews.text: There were several screws missing so we had to go buy some. The directions were hard to follow. Also when we opened the box, we noticed several dents on the covers and the main frame. The screws strip very easily also.
customer_reviews.author: JD Keeley

customer_reviews.title: Love the grill but some screws was missing
customer_reviews.text: Love it, some screws was missing and you have to put it all together and there's alot of things to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Chesney

customer_reviews.title: Grill
customer_reviews.text: It too my husband less than a day to put it together. I have no regrets..burn good. Very nice.
customer_reviews.author: lorna trelevan

customer_reviews.title: Hope you have time to spare
customer_reviews.text: Over 6 hours to assemble following the VERY small pictures. No parts labeled. Overall great value for the price and looks great once together.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Liked it when assembled and all pieces are in place , felt like a good reward after spending about 6 hours of assembling.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Top notch grill!
customer_reviews.text: Best grill I’ve ever had! Directions were easy to follow!
customer_reviews.author: Carey

customer_reviews.title: Grill works great
customer_reviews.text: Part came damaged. In box didn’t notice till I was 2 hrs into putting it together so instead of taking apart I fixed part and kept building grill
customer_reviews.author: Vardy

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Love this grill! Very good quality! A little time consuming to put together but overall very satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Great grill for the price. One side of the gas grill is hotter than the other. It’s great for slow cooking. Overall we love it!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Schulz

customer_reviews.title: Took all day to put together
customer_reviews.text: Took all day to put together and has something hanging on a chain saying it is for lighter or match . No where in direction does it tell you how to use.
customer_reviews.author: Renee M. Shambra

customer_reviews.title: FULL ASSEMBLY REQUIRED!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very time consuming full assembly required grill. Not sure yet if it was worth $240
customer_reviews.author: Perry Fennell

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Very solid when assembled, works great. Wish I could find a cover for it.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Beltzer

customer_reviews.title: al online will work with you to fix issues
customer_reviews.text: the grill came damaged from manufacturer al online worked with me to resolve issue they did as said
customer_reviews.author: steve Neblock

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact that I can either use the gas grill or the charcoal side. Enjoying the Grill.
customer_reviews.author: Edgar Cintron

customer_reviews.title: Best grill ever
customer_reviews.text: I like this grill it's not only beautiful but easy to use and grilled very well! Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Hawa

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Nice grill. Easy to assemble took about 1 1/2 hours. And was delivered early.
customer_reviews.author: Martin

customer_reviews.title: Great grill
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble and works great. Good quality for the price!
customer_reviews.author: SC

customer_reviews.title: Good food
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my son! We really enjoy the food we’ve grilled!
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Coppage

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: We love the grill. Great buy for a fair price.
customer_reviews.author: christine morris

customer_reviews.title: Hard to build
customer_reviews.text: It was a hard to put all the things together
customer_reviews.author: Jesus

customer_reviews.title: great value
customer_reviews.text: There was some dents but for the price, its an awesome grill.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Sever

customer_reviews.title: Great bbq!
customer_reviews.text: Great set up! It does take some time to assemble, but fairly easy.
customer_reviews.author: David Rundle

product_meta.title: Dual Fuel Combination Charcoal/Gas Grill
product_meta.description: Enjoy the best of both! Are you a grilling aficionado that appreciates the taste that some say can only be achieved cooking over charcoal, or do you prefer the convenience and flavors of grilling with gas? The discussion about which is better has been going on for many years and likely will continue for many more. From our thinking both sides are right, and we wonder why you should have to choose one over the other. With this large Combination Charcoal/Gas Grill you can have both with lots of space to grill how you want, when you want, to achieve the results you want. This spacious grill has a total of 557 square inches of cooking space that can accommodate 32 burgers (16 per side) at once and an additional 188 square inches of warming space. As an added convenience, the grill includes a gas-powered side burner that can be used to prepare your favorite sauces or a whole host of other dishes. Dual Fuel Combination Charcoal/Gas Grill: 557 sq in total cooking space (262 charcoal, 295 gas) 188 sq in total warming rack space (89 charcoal, 99 gas) Cast iron cooking grids Chrome-plated warming racks Gas side has 3 stainless steel tube burners offering a total of 24,000 BTUs Stainless steel 12,000-BTU side burner with cover Includes integrated ignition for all burners with rubber grip control knobs Porcelain-coated heat plates reduce flare-ups Charcoal side has height-adjustable charcoal tray Front access door to maintain charcoal Removable ash tray for cleanup Black baked enamel lids with stainless steel trim Baked enamel bottom bowls Painted steel control panel with stainless steel trim Features 2 spacious side shelves 2 round temperature gauges Integrated tool holders and bottle opener 2 wheels for mobility This grill uses a 70" grill cover (sold separately) LP tank not included Measures approximately 64"L x 28"W x 49.75"H Weighs approximately 90 lbs (103 lbs in the box) Model# GBC1793W
feature_bullets: Gas side has 3 stainless steel tube burners offering a total of 24,000 BTUs
Includes integrated ignition for all burners with rubber grip control knobs
188 sq in total warming rack space (89 charcoal, 99 gas) / 2 wheels for mobility
557 sq in total cooking space (262 charcoal, 295 gas) / Model# GBC1793W / Cast iron cooking grids
Painted steel control panel with stainless steel trim / LP tank not included
